title: Finally Some Justice
body: I was considering posting on here about how skewed Riot's punishment system is - I have received my fair share of 10 game chat restrictions for accurately describing a terrible player as a terrible player, truly an egregious offense, meanwhile I've seen players drop hard R racial slurs without punishment - I saw them a few games later and they were still typing in /all chat (Kappa). However, I just got an instant feedback notification and I'm pretty sure Riot finally punished an intentional feeder who sold their items for a tear and 5 sapphire crystals. Thanks for doing the right thing uncle Riot.

replies.body:
why did you say Kappa.
Kappa is the sarcasm emoji of twitch.tv

Also what a short frog spirit from Japanese folklore, that in some popularized things, would say it at the end of their sentence with a point that perhaps didn't even need to be said, except to point out how obvious it is to them, *kappa*.

Since it really became commonly used in the 20's and 30's because it's Greek, it surely doesn't belong to Twitch. Why does {{champion:29}}  even have tv?
